thread.section_title: Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worst hotel
thread.title_full: Worst hotel - Review of Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mustafa C
title: Worst hotel
text: Stayed at the adagio apart hotel luckily 1 night it was our worst hotel experience I've looked at the pictures on trip advisor and red the reviews I taught it was a good place from entrance to rooms it's old dirty walls are very dirty tables chairs etc from last century I would not stay there for free it was a very disappointing first room we were given I had to complain and they gave another room it wasn't any better u can't open the windows coz building is tall fair enough but windows should be at least little bit clean so you can look outside not that anything to look anyway
